original_text: Moses spoke to Israel's people. A man had said bad things about God. They took him outside the camp. They threw stones at him until he died. Israel's people did as the Lord had told Moses.
korean_text: 모세가 이스라엘 자손에게 말하니 그들이 그 저주한 자를 진영 밖으로 끌어내어 돌로 쳤더라 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: A man had said bad things about God.
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 하나님에 대해 나쁜 말을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They took him outside the camp.
They threw stones at him until he died.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그가 죽을 때까지 돌을 던졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: Israel's people did as the Lord had told Moses.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성은 주께서 모세에게 말씀하신 대로 했습니다.
